name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Willie CLAYTON, Appellant

judges: BEFORE: CASTILLE, C.J., SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD, McCAFFERY, ORIE MELVIN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Willie CLAYTON, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of June, 2011, the order of the Court of Common Pleas is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: James H. Moreno, David Lee Zuckerman, Defender Association of Philadelphia, Philadelphia, for Willie Clayton.
Hugh J. Burns, Philadelphia District Attorney’s Office, Philadelphia, Amy Zapp, Harrisburg, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
casebody.head_matter:
21 A.3d 1187
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Willie CLAYTON, Appellant.

June 21, 2011.
James H. Moreno, David Lee Zuckerman, Defender Association of Philadelphia, Philadelphia, for Willie Clayton.
